website_summaries.verdict: Designed for safe and comfortable adventures in and around water, the Merrell Hydro Moc gets overwhelming feedback for being downright comfortable. Many people love that it's lightweight and supportive, which enables them to move quickly and navigate wet and dry terrains safely. What's more - it offers the durability you'd expect from other Merrell hiking shoes.Many people may find the Hydro Moc wider than regular hiking shoes/sandals. It's best to get an actual fitting to get a perfect fit.
pros: Many people who have used the Merrell Hydro Moc are pleased by how comfortable this water hiking sandal/shoe is
Lots of verified buyers also give it high ratings for its lightweight construction
The majority of Merrell Hydro Moc reviews talk about its versatility
Several users love the good level of support that this lightweight hiking shoe offers
Some people appreciate the heel tab that holds the shoe in place when walking on tough ground
Lots of reviewers are also pleased by the quality of this water hiker
They think this shoe will last for long
cons: Many say that the Merrell Hydro Moc sandals are wider than expected
A few customers have had issues with sweaty feet in some extremely hot days

customer_reviews.title: Mixed reviews. Mostly good.
customer_reviews.text: Yes. Order a size smaller. I wear a 9, ordered an 8. Fit perfectly dry but my foot had a tendency to slip inside the shoe when wet. Worn them kayaking with mostly positive experiences. Solid sole on oyster shells. Picked up a few “hitchhikers”, drained well, comfortable, but with some slippage. Stayed on my feet in pluff mud. I realize if you’re from off, you don’t know what that is. I can’t give it 5 stars due to inaccurate sizing and the slip factor.
customer_reviews.author: Bill E.

customer_reviews.title: Buy Small and Don't Expect Protection From Punctures of the Sole
customer_reviews.text: Like others recommended I bought a pair one size smaller than my standard shoe size and the smaller water shoes fit perfect. They are comfortable and flexible. The only thing I don't like about them is the lack of a more sturdy sole. The soles are made of the same soft foam rubber as the rest of the shoe. Sharp rocks or other objects could easily tear through this material. I expect the soles will wear out more quickly because there's no more sturdy material there.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W.

customer_reviews.title: These are the most comfortable shoes in the world.... of this kind, anyway!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got a pair of these shoes last winter, and once I discovered them not being worn daily, I began to slip them on to do all sorts of things around the house and yard. They are so comfortable! However, we couldn't both wear them at the same time, which meant I ordered these. I absolutely love them. I actually own 2 pair now.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G T

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these from Wolverine Worldwide on Amazon and attempted to return within days of receipt. No reply so I just gave up as I forgot about the return request, only to be told later that the return time frame had expired. That said, these shoes over NO support whatsoever and otherwise slip from underneath the soles. I cannot believe how terrible these shoes are especially given Merrell typifies a good quality shoe. This is not not up to standard. Tossed mine out.
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable shoes. I had crocs for a long time.....Never again. These are so much better. I know it’s a water shoe, but I use them as a slipper around the house. I’ll be buying more of these. Just be sure to order a full size lower than what you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Chris O

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: For what they are... they are nice. As others have stated they are much more comfortable than crocs. If you are a “true” size 11 then these should fit just fine. Great for some one with wider feet. Very comfortable. They look big when I have them on but there is very little play in the ankle area. I’d actually feel fine running in these if need be although I don’t anticipate that. If you can get these at the price I did then they are a steal. Merrell for the win. Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Weirdy McWeirdertyn

customer_reviews.title: If you have skin that tends to blister, either wear socks or get a pair of open backed Crocs
customer_reviews.text: Thought these were cool but after three days walking around the house without socks, the back of the right shoe rubbed the skin right off the back of my foot above the heel. Am very disappointed as I liked the look and feel of these shoes. Until the blister...
customer_reviews.author: Bisonte

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of water shoes
customer_reviews.text: Decided to leave a review for these items just to help out anyone that is thinking about getting them. They are great water shows and I purchased them so I could wear at a waterpark. But, the reason for my review is even though they are great, these run larger than expected. I am normally a size 11 and I had to get size 9 to give me a good fit. Once you get the right size, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Silva

customer_reviews.title: Nice water/walking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: As an avid Croc wearer, I wanted something a little different. These fit the bill, although a tiny bit snug around my ankles I really enjoyed the heal guard on the back--kept my shoe in place, and although I have not been in the water with these yet, I'm sure these will be invaluable to keep the shoes in place. I did do a 4 mile hike with these (on the sidewalk)with a light backpack (20 lbs) and they held up beautifully. The soles are very thick and they have a nice interior contour that hugs the feet--unlike the flat bottom of a Croc. I think I may have found my everyday AND Hiking shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable versatile and nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best for a quick comfortable wear. These are so versatile and comfortable. Great For yard work, washing car, relaxing outside or at a pool, and any casual situation. They look nice too. Want to try out some other colors. Only cons are the bottoms seem to wear a little fast on concrete and like sandals there is no ankle support and the bottoms are a little rounded so not recommended to anything where running or direction change is probable or you might roll you ankle.
customer_reviews.author: TJS

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a 9.5 and ordered an 8. Fits perfect. Great comfortable water shoe
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Bell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, too flexible and too big.
customer_reviews.text: Too flexible and too sloppy feeling for my liking. I wear a 12.5 or 13, bought a 12 and it’s still too large. There is no way to drain all water out of the shoe as the holes are all above the footbed, creating a little bath tub. The flexibility is too soft for any serious walking or activity, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Solid water shoe
customer_reviews.text: They do run large as the reviews say, if you want a snug fit, go down 1.5-2 sizes. I went down one size and am very happy with the fit. They are easily sucked off in mud and silt, but other than that, they have been solid on grass, pavement, slippery boat ramps, rocks, sand, plants, etc..... They can trap sand and small pebbles. They do float, and are very light weight. They do not seem to grip any better or worse than most sneakers or hiking shoes i own. They are also comfortable. They clean up nice. I throw mine right in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: alan perry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome when dry but terrible when wet.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable...normally. this is my second pair. Normally they run large but this pair is tight. Again they are very comfortable and makes your feet feel pretty darn good. But the problem occurred when they got wet. My feet slipped inside them so badly because I had to wash my feet off with a hose, that I darn near twisted my knee into a bad injury. DO NOT BUY FOR WATER! Buy for dry comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: TOO BIG
customer_reviews.text: These shoes too loose and big for the size. I wear a TRUE 11.5 and Merrell suggests to go to the size smaller. I did, but they are still too loose and feel like they are going to come off. I would return them, but ZAPPOS charges a restocking fee and return shipping in order to get a smaller size. A little ridiculous and bad customer service. Look elsewhere that utilizes AMAZON's Prime Customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband, because the beach we go to has rocks in the water that can't always be seen, and are very hard on bare feet. These work great as foot protection, because the water flows through them, and they dry instantly in the sun. I would suggest you size down if you're between sizes, because they tend to run big, and your feet will slide in them when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Stoops

customer_reviews.title: Great around the water!
customer_reviews.text: I had to send these back, I read the reviews but they were small so I ordered accordingly but they are extremely small. I am at still giving them five stars because once I got them I am super happy with them. I wear them to the lake in the kayak and around the water. They fit very nicely and don’t slip light crocs. Order about 1 Size smaller or more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: A very nice water shoe but a bit expensive. I have bought Crocs just like this for under $20. The colors are great and different. These are more comfortable to me than Crocs. These do not have the annoying "massage bumps" on the insole. Overall rating is still 5 Stars but I did send them back because I could not really afford them.
customer_reviews.author: misterdaveusa

customer_reviews.title: Too big but oh so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear these as indoor outdoor house shoes. I like the over the top modern design and they are amazing comfortable. These shoes run huge - I ordered a full size down and they are still a bit big for me.
customer_reviews.author: gochrisgo

customer_reviews.title: WAY better than Crocs
customer_reviews.text: I used to sometimes wear Crocs for quick backyard errands, etc. I never really liked them, but these fit so much better, are so much lighter and better ventilated, that I do sometimes wear these for short errands around town. IMHO they look much better, too. Great for camping, kayaking, and casual biking too.
customer_reviews.author: G. Spooner

customer_reviews.title: Better than Crocs
customer_reviews.text: Hydro Mocs are very comfortable and better looking than Crocs. As it has been said they run at least a size large. We'll have to see how durable they are but they are primarily an indoor shoe. I am seriously considering getting the slide on version for shuffling around the house since the Mocs are so comfy!
customer_reviews.author: C C

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size down. At least.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly cannot believe that ANYONE says these run true to size.. They are delusional, or do not know their actual shoe size... A short lifetime of fitting feet for hockey skates and figure skates using european sizing because its truer than American. I wear a 10.5/44.5 in Asics, 9.5-10/44-44.5 in Nike, 10/44.5 Adidas. With socks on, these things aren't even close. Do yourself a favor and order 1 size down at least. If you were your shoes slightly larger, then order 2 sizes down. DO NOT FORGET YOU WILL PROBABLY BE BAREFOOT while wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: Sean F.

customer_reviews.title: What if Merrell made a Croc?
customer_reviews.text: I really like these, no problems with size. I am a 12 and 12 fits. I have long had Crocs for quick trips outside, Merrell for my regular shoes, betters soles and more comfortable. What if Merrell made a shoe like the Croc? I’ll tell you, it works. An all rubber shoe with a nice sole gives a nice bounce. Just walk 5 miles in them and I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: David Brown

customer_reviews.title: Are you feeling lucky?
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11 1/2 but ordered 10 given comments on sizing, The water shoe managed to be painfully tight in the toe, loose in the heel, and way too wide. I give it a 3 because if it fits it's probably good water shoe. Shame on Merrell for being so off the mark for sizing
customer_reviews.author: Sam Marr

customer_reviews.title: Getting the right size is very difficult indeed.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and son-in-law are enjoying these wonderful shoes. I ordered them twice in what I thought was a US 5, but neither pair was that size. One was a U.K. 5 and the other pair a version of US 7 more like a men’s US nine. I have given up ordering Merrill’s from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was getting the camouflage ones. My friends are making fun of the blue ones but my granddaughter likes the color. I would definitely get a ful size smaller as they do run large. Quite comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: It is way too large, I had to return mine.
customer_reviews.text: It is way too large, I had to return mine. The return was not as smooth as I hoped, but returned it for full refund. Most sizes for my preferred colors are not available, and "free returns" no longer seem to be an option on most of them. Cannot say about how comfortable or the quality of the product as I only tried them on (I gave it a 3 stars as to be neutral and be able to submit a review).
customer_reviews.author: Nomad

customer_reviews.title: Way to big
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8.5, I read the reviews everyone said it runs big. I ordered 8 and returned they felt like size 10 unfortunately they only go to a size 7 which will probably be still to big. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Better support than Crocs. Fit is 1/2 size large; order down 1/2 size.
customer_reviews.text: These give me good arch support for a sandal. They are a little sweaty when worn without socks in warm weather, but not bad. I ordered an 11 when I usually wear an 11 1/2; they fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Doug K.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work in the yard shoes and it was a perfect choice! easy to put on comfortable and can be rinsed off with the garden hose. Thank you MERRELL The service was great!, would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kayak Shoe, But Extremely Oversized
customer_reviews.text: Great traction both inside the shoe and on the ground. Bought them for kayak fishing and I like them. The problem is that they are huge. I read the recommendation to buy a half size down and I did, but they were still way too long. I wear regularly wear a 10.5, I bought these in a 10, but probably should have bought a 9. I didn’t send them back, because like I previously mentioned, there is great traction between my feet and the shoe, so I don’t really slip around inside the shoe. Wish I could have tried them on first.
customer_reviews.author: Will Killmore

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: The reviews said to buy these shoes one size small. That is not enough. They are huge. I would be willing to try a size smaller, but the return label that comes with the shoes says they will deduct $6 from the refund when I mail them back. Beware! Shopping for shoes at $6 a try can be expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Dickie Walls

customer_reviews.title: Looks aren't everything
customer_reviews.text: Even for fishing shoes these are horrible. I was looking forba different option to the basic crocs and these looked good. Thats it. They look good. They hurt my feet beyond belief.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but like others have said - it will blister your heel
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the first 10-15 mins of walking and then your heel or inside of your foot will begin to get sore. I tried messing with the strap and putting it on the inside (instead of outside) and that helped a little but still started to hurt after a while. What's funny is - only my left foot is affected. My right was fine. I think if I had a bandaid on it would help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M

customer_reviews.title: Not just a water moc, if you have a bad back, the soft impactevry step is a god send!!
customer_reviews.text: Discovered what I purchased as a kayak water shoe is a blessing as an everyday walking shoe for individuals with lower back problems. The soft impact every step greatly lessens the impact on the lumbar vertebra. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: zedman

customer_reviews.title: Runs big but built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a full size down and they fit perfectly. I pretty much live in these things now. Nothing bad to say. The heel and strap are so much better than crocs.
customer_reviews.author: CMDR Shamozzle

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: I like the design, comfort and overall look of the shoe. However, these things run pretty big. I wear a size 12 sneaker, boot, shoe but cautiously taking the advice of a few buyers, I order and 11. Still big on my feet. The comfort is incredible but the soul seems a bit thin as a thorn from a rose bush made its way through and made an attempt at piercing my callused foot. Also, once wet, it’s a bit slicker inside the shoe than I expected. For the price, it’s an ok.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: Don't order from Peltz Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The strap on the left shoe was defective and broke the first time I wore them. However, Peltz requires that I pay for the postage in order to return this defective item. And even then, it's not clear they will refund to money, since Peltz return requirements for defective items are basically BS. So, rather than pay the postage and then be denied a refund, I'm just gonna suck up the loss. Lesson learned: Don't purchase anything from Peltz!
customer_reviews.author: Eugene J. Kirschbaum

customer_reviews.title: Good looking water shoe
customer_reviews.text: Seems very solid. Had to reorder smaller size shoe than I normally wear. if wearing a long time, socks or some type liner needed as rubbed inside of foot just below ankle raw. Attractive shoe, got favorable comments on appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Better than crocs
customer_reviews.text: So I have another pair of Merrill's that look similar. They are super soft and amazingly comfortable. These are harder and I don't like them near as much.
customer_reviews.author: J.B. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Nice but run way large
customer_reviews.text: Immediately sent them back. I wear an 11 but they were very wide and long. Should order one full size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: R Turner

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I wear a lot of water shoes and have gone though at least a dozen pairs of Shimano’s...these are not as good in my opinion but they are a good water shoe. I wear mine almost year round because I live in Florida. Wish these shoes were just a bit firmer plastic and didn’t flex so much when wet.
customer_reviews.author: T.Poltz

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. I wear a 10.5 and ordered a 10, fits perfect. Seem to be decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size down
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these one size smaller as recommended by other reviewer’s and it was the right move. The only thing is, If you wear the strap in the back, it makes them a bit tighter. Moving the strap to the front, adds more flexibility in the back. They are pricey for a water shoe but they seem to be thick around the bottom and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, he was very pleased and says they are comfortable. I did buy them a half size smaller due to the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: D. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back and order a size small. I wear a 12 in hiking shoes and a 11 fit perfectly. Very comfortable with plenty of arch support. Really like that they are not open in the back also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!! So comfortable. I HATE Crocks, and these aren't like Crocks (in my opinion). After reading reviews, I went a full size smaller, could have gone a 1/2 size even smaller if I could, but the fit was great following the "order a full size smaller than normal" guideline
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Form Fitting, Comfortable, Light Weight Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Read some reviews about the size. It's not that hard, size down a half size if you are in between sizes, or a full size if you are not.
customer_reviews.author: J. F.

customer_reviews.title: They cool
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe but the strap on one shoe broke the first day didn't do nothing but stand and walk at work
customer_reviews.author: latysha t.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear them with my water socks, because my foot slides when they get wet, limited grip on the inside
customer_reviews.author: Anthony K Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable But order a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: I am a 12, but an 11 is almost too big for me. Make sure to order one size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton Broumand

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Second pair. Great to wear in my boat. Great to wear around the house. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Adler

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are nice and lite but I had to return them because they were way too big. Order a couple sizes down for a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Williams

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: just not comfortable and bought a size smaller as others recommended but still too big
customer_reviews.author: Robt L

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for summer wear
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. They fit as expected, easy to walk in and stays on foot in water.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Not for wearing out of the water?
customer_reviews.text: Blisters on both heels within 30 minutes of walking in these.
customer_reviews.author: Adam August

customer_reviews.title: True to size - COMFY
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and durable. True to size. GREAT quality for a decent price
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great for gardening
customer_reviews.text: These run large. I could have gotten 2 sizes smaller, but they still work for gardening, kayaking, creek stomping, etc.
customer_reviews.author: M Arthur Williams

customer_reviews.title: Order a size smaller than you wear.
customer_reviews.text: Your site showed that I needed a size 11 and that’s what I ordered. They are over an inch to large and my foot slides inside and now I have multi able blisters. When I received the package, it was torn up and could not send back for a smaller size. Guess they will be in given to needy. Can not afford another $50 for size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Performs as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, great support and water and sand drain and fall out easily. I’d say they run about 0.5 big. I have a wide foot and sides stretch easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen D

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8.5 in their hiking boots but a 7 in these. Amazing water shoe!
customer_reviews.author: jmmauck

customer_reviews.title: Comfortability to the max !
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable shoe I ever purchased . Fits perfectly ! Highly recommend to customers with injuries in need of a therapeutic shoe or croc lovers , this is a better version .10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Running laps in pool?
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need for running laps at Aquatic Center.
customer_reviews.author: House Mom

customer_reviews.title: Way BIG
customer_reviews.text: Although the shoe looks and feels great, they run really large. I normally wear an 11.5-12 so I ordered the 11. I could put a couple fingers between my heal and shoe. Ordering a 10 and it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Manno

customer_reviews.title: Size issue
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 10 shoe however size 8 in theses. Run real small.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Rhodus

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe...Bug don’t get them wet they become very slippery x
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Really run big in terms of fit!
customer_reviews.text: Have not tried to use the shoes yet but tried them on. Wow people are not kidding that they run big. I am a solid 10 Across the board. I ordered a 9 in these and they still feel slightly big
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Sexy as hell
customer_reviews.text: One of these days, these shoes are gonna walk all over you.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Kinda big
customer_reviews.text: Its not that I disliked the shoes i love them but i ordered my regular size mens 12 and seem big im afraid if i return them the 11 maybe to small
customer_reviews.author: Trevor R

customer_reviews.title: Very off sized
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely great made shoe with one HUGE downfall. They are at least 2 sizes off. I ordered a size 10 and had to return them for a size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Better than Crocs!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable. They run a little big. I wear a 14 size show and I had seen other reviews about sizing so I got a 13. It fits just right. Great for all kinds of activities.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They will be good to walk in and out of the pool in the hot Arizona sun
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT DINUCCI

customer_reviews.title: Great for use in the water
customer_reviews.text: Works great for shower shoes instead of flip-flops. Very comfortable and soft on the arches.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from my crocs, good value and very comfortable, a little on the big side which accounts for the missing star.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Way better than crocs
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy. I don’t take them off. All day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes! This is his second pair. He has a gray pair that he has worn for a year and now has this black pair. Super comfortable :)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal McCallie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great for getting wet and working in the garden . Easy to clean up .
customer_reviews.author: Peter Bolay

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable, the way the material feels against your foot. It’s awesome no issues at all. I like them better than Crocs.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Suddeth

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.author: John L. Small

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are very dangerous when wet, almost imposible to walk in when wet.  Buyer beware....
customer_reviews.text: For a shoe that is supposed to be water friendly they are extremely difficult to walk in when wet.....
customer_reviews.author: Bart Sewell

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfectly with the right size!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and everyone was saying the fit was large. Order one size smaller. So I did and they fit perfectly. Quick shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: MACK

customer_reviews.title: Not what i thought they don't slip on easily
customer_reviews.text: they don't slip on easily and the material is funky on my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Salomon

customer_reviews.title: Looks crazy fells great!
customer_reviews.text: Order a size smaller than your normal size Very comfortable. Ships fast
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Mantz

customer_reviews.title: edgy crocs
customer_reviews.text: Pros: You'll have sick edgy crocs Cons: Everyone will resent you for sick edgy crocs
customer_reviews.author: Jake Schleicher

customer_reviews.title: Better than Crocs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sizing , incredible fitting size 14 normally on sneakers. After over 6 months or so , it just continue to be one if not the best water shoe, true to size and great comfort
customer_reviews.author: BdC

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Hydro Moc Water Shoe
product_meta.description: Using advanced construction techniques, this easy on / easy off shoe is more durable that others of its kind--for days spent in and around water.
feature_bullets: Articulated heel with strap for secure fit
